title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3456/86 of 10 November 1986 temporarily suspending the autonomous Common Customs Tariff duties on a number of agricultural products
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 3456/86
of 10 November 1986
temporarily suspending the autonomous Common Customs Tariff duties on a number of agricultural products
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The autonomous Common Customs Tariff duties for the products listed in the Annex hereto shall be suspended at the level indicated opposite each of them.
These suspensions shall be applicable from 1 January to 30 June 1987.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 November 1986.
For the Council
The President
J. MOORE
ANNEX
1.2.3 //  //  //  // CCT heading No  // Description  // Rate of autonomous duty (%)   //    //   //   // ex 03.01 B I e) 1  // Piked dogfish (Squalus acanthias) fresh, chilled or frozen, whole, headless or in pieces   // 6   // ex 03.01 B I y)  // Red Snapper (Lutjanus campechanus)   // 0   //    //   //
